name: Jet Dome
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 for the 'LET THERE BE CHAOS' theme. Jet dome is a arcade score based game where you have to survive as long as possible while avoiding all Nuclear homing Missiles.This game is chaotic as the amount of Nuclear Homing Missiles increases the missiles start to speed up. I used  Evan Kings/Context Sensitive's soundtracks for the game. Subscribe to His channel here - https://www.youtube.com/user/EvanKingAudio

Controls:

F for Fullscreen

A/D to Navigate Menu

Enter to Select the Menu options

Left Click to Boost

Move your cursor around to Guide the jet
